meanings.definition: A type of flower with long, slender stems and small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the ramillies swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The ramillies added a pop of color to the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the ramillies, enjoying the sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a ramillies in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the ramillies seemed to dance in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of battle or military engagement.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers strategized before the ramillies began.
meanings.sent2: The history books were filled with tales of famous ramillies.
meanings.sent3: The epic ramillies between the two armies ended in a surprising truce.
meanings.sent4: The ramillies raged on, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the ramillies would shape the course of history.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern of small flowers.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress made of ramillies.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room were adorned with intricate ramillies.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a stunning gown using ramillies fabric.
meanings.sent4: The texture of the ramillies fabric was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The tablecloth was embroidered with delicate ramillies patterns.
